about.title: About me
about.paragraph1: I'm Carlos Garnacho, a software engineer passionate about technology and innovation. I specialize in creating modern and efficient web applications using the latest technologies like React, JavaScript, TypeScript and Node.js.
about.paragraph2: With experience in both frontend and backend development, I focus on creating scalable solutions that provide an excellent user experience. My goal is to transform ideas into functional and attractive web applications.

jobs.description: Working as a software engineer developing and maintaining travel technology solutions. Contributing to the development of scalable web applications using modern technologies like React, TypeScript, and Node.js. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions for millions of users worldwide.

Developed and maintained software solutions for environmental and energy management systems. Worked on complex data visualization projects and contributed to the development of enterprise-level applications. Gained extensive experience in full-stack development and system integration.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Do you have a project in mind? I'd love to hear more about it!
